casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Johnny Wayne HYDE. No. 529A98-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 6, 2005. Edwin W. Welch, Special Deputy Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of July 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Johnny Wayne Hyde) shall have up to and including the 15th day of September 2005 to file and serve his/her Petition for Writ of Certiorari with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of July 2005."
